name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Review Hero, Amazon Product Review Summarizer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Review Hero summarizes the product reviews on an Amazon Product Detail Page using AI.

Version 1.5
* Remove the functionality to "Hide Ads". Now the extension provides a single and narrow functionality as per Chrome Store Extension Policy. I will release the "Hide Ads" as a separate Chrome Extension.

Version 1.4
* Enhance Review Summary using more reviews and product information.

Version 1.3
* Hide Ads (Sponsored products) when searching on Amazon. Just Click on Hide Ads button on the bottom right of the page.

Version 1.2 
* Displays item's seller information and item's "country of origin" right along with the review summary
* Collapse / Expand button to hide / show review summary.

Version 1.1
* Fixed Bug

Version 1.0
* Amazon Sellers - Use this extension to understand the overall summary of the reviews that the customers see for your products. 

* Amazon Customers - Use this extension to make quick decision to add a product to cart or not. 

* Product Review Summary appears in the local Amazon supported language for the country. For example, Product Review Summary appears in Spanish on Amazon Mexico which it appears in English in US. 

* Support Product Detail Pages in Amazon US, UK, DE, JP, FR, IT, ES, NL, IN, SG, AU, MX, BR
